title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
content:
Photo submitted by Eddie Smith, “My friend Vinnie and I were riding out on our lunchbreak enjoying a wonderful evening on the south shore of the Monongahela and shot a couple pics for my newly built bike.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
